content: In August 2022, we had 7,042,031 in sales, which was a decrease of 15.6% compared to the previous month and a decrease of 81.2% compared to the same month the previous year. We had 15,369 unique buyers, which was a decrease of 12.4% compared to the previous month and a decrease of 73.3% compared to the same month the previous year. We had 423,164 total transactions, which was a decrease of 22.8% compared to the previous month and a decrease of 49.2% compared to the same month the previous year. The average sale was $16.64, which was an increase of 9.3% compared to the previous month and a decrease of 63.0% compared to the same month the previous year.
